dc.title: Congressman Steve Scalise Representing the 1st of Louisiana | Homepage
dc.description: Steve Scalise was elected to the United States House of Representatives in November 2004 to represent Louisiana's First Congressional District. He is an experienced public servant prepared to meet the challenges before the United States Congress, and is committed to representing the interests of the people of Louisiana.
